mapper.select:
SELECT * from project_parameter WHERE 1=1
AND NO = #{projNo}

select cmBT.name as big_type_value, cmST.name as small_type_value, param.name as name, param.UNIT as unit, cmS.name as source_value, projparam.no as no, projparam. parameter_id as id, projparam.parameter as parameter, projparam.IS_DISPLAY as isDisplay from project_parameter projparam inner join parameter_info param on projparam.PARAMETER_ID = param.ID left join code_master_info cmS on cmS.CODEKEY='Source' and projparam.SOURCE_VALUE=cmS.VALUE left join code_master_info cmST on cmST.CODEKEY='SmallType' and param.SMALL_TYPE_VALUE=cmST.VALUE left join code_master_info cmBT on cmBT.CODEKEY='BigType' and param.BIG_TYPE_VALUE=cmBT.VALUE where projparam.no = #{projNo}
order by ${sort} ${order}
